column1:
NOTICE: This is a community record of protest actions past, present, and future. 
This is not an endorsement of any organizations involved in the protest actions.
This intention of this list is to document, preserve, and share awareness.

If for your own reasons you choose to attend any of these, please keep your 
love for your neighbors and family in mind, prepare, act, and lead accordingly.

column3: STARVATION & NEGLECT ARE TORTURE! STOP THE DEPORTATIONS! NO MORE INHUMANE DETENTIONS!
column7: Maria Valeriano P√©rez, a beloved Ventura County mother of three was forcibly taken by ICE during a routine immigration check-in this week. Detained with other women, she endured horrific conditions: denied showers, clean clothes, and adequate food. A diabetic, Maria was deprived of enough food to safely take her medication, risking her health. Though now deported to Tijuana, the abuse she and others suffered must end.
supporting arrested protestors connect to legal aid after release

Join us in rallying for the freedom of our loved ones and neighbors who have been kidnapped by ICE. You'll hear from family members of Emma de Paz, street vendor who is detained and in critical need of medical attention, and eastside students who have been impacted by this terror.

column7: No school, no work, no business as usual when thousands of our neighbors have been kidnapped and the rent is still due on the 1st. Tomorrow, connect with a food distribution, protest, teach-in, or defense network in YOUR neighborhood and help build the groundwork for mass coordinated strikes! No hay escuela, no hay trabajo, no hay que fingir que todo sigue igual cuando miles de nuestros vecinos han sido secuestrados, pero la renta todav√≠a se debe el primero del mes. ¬°Con√©ctate con una distribuci√≥n de alimentos, protesta, aprendizaje, o red de defensa en TU barrio y ayuda a construir las bases para huelgas masivas coordinadas!

column3: ICE OUT OF LA Press Conference & Rally
column7: Los √Ångeles - Tomorrow makes 30 days of the militarized assault on Los Angeles. Join us at this action to continue to demand that the kidnappers and the US military get OUT of our city! MAGA colonial fascism thought that bringing in the military would scare us and that the protests would stop but we have proven that we have continued the resistance and we are NOT going to stop until the kidnappings stop! Que viva la resistencia! Uni√≥n del Barrio is a proud member of the Community Self-Defense Coalition!
